eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Granite, MT; AT 10:42 AM ON SEP 24, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:44 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: THERE IS A GAS LEAK ON MAIN ST IN HALL - PLEASE AVOID THE AREA IF POSSIBLE - WE WILL SEND OUT ANOTHER ALERT ONCE THE SCENE IS CLEAR. YOU CAN CONTACT NORTH WESTERN ENERGY FOR MORE INFORMATION AT 406-497-2030. PLEASE AVOID MAIN ST IN HALL
